title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 25, 2022
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 25, 2022 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [pipenv (owenstranathan) (⭐18)](https://github.com/owenstranathan/pipenv.zsh) - Automatically activates a **pipenv** when entering a directory if there is Pipfile in that directory. Includes `pipenv` completions.
*   [pipenv (sudosubin) (⭐0)](https://github.com/sudosubin/zsh-pipenv) - Enables `pipenv`'s `$PATH` and adds completions.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • pipenv (owenstranathan) (⭐18) - Automatically activates a pipenv when entering a directory if there is Pipfile in that directory. Includes pipenv completions.
  • pipenv (sudosubin) (⭐0) - Enables pipenv's $PATH and adds completions.

items.title: Awesome Security
items.content_text:
### Endpoint / Anti-Virus / Anti-Malware

*   [ClamAv](http://www.clamav.net/) - ClamAV® is an open-source antivirus engine for detecting trojans, viruses, malware & other malicious threats.
items.content_html:
Endpoint / Anti-Virus / Anti-Malware

  • ClamAv - ClamAV® is an open-source antivirus engine for detecting trojans, viruses, malware & other malicious threats.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### GUI

*   [AppIndicator Go (⭐6)](https://github.com/gopherlibs/appindicator) - Go bindings for libappindicator3 C library.
items.content_html:
GUI

  • AppIndicator Go (⭐6) - Go bindings for libappindicator3 C library.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / E-commerce

*   [s-cart](https://s-cart.org/) - S-Cart is a free e-commerce website project for individuals and businesses, built on top of Laravel Framework. ([Demo](https://demo.s-cart.org/), [Source Code (⭐718)](https://github.com/s-cart/s-cart)) `MIT` `PHP`

### Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

*   [Lancache](https://lancache.net) `⚠` - LAN Party game caching made easy. ([Source Code (⭐810)](https://github.com/lancachenet/monolithic)) `MIT` `Docker/Shell`

### Software / Personal Dashboards

*   [Web-Portal (⭐229)](https://github.com/enchant97/web-portal) - A python web app designed to allow a easy way to manage the links to all of your web services. `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Python`

### Software / Proxy

*   [Outline Server](https://getoutline.org/) - A proxy server that runs a Shadowsocks instance for each access key and a REST API to manage the access keys. ([Source Code (⭐6k)](https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server)) `Apache-2.0` `Docker/Nodejs`
items.content_html:
Software / E-commerce

  • s-cart - S-Cart is a free e-commerce website project for individuals and businesses, built on top of Laravel Framework. (Demo, Source Code (⭐718)) MIT PHP

Software / Games - Administrative Utilities & Control Panels

  • Lancache ⚠ - LAN Party game caching made easy. (Source Code (⭐810)) MIT Docker/Shell

Software / Personal Dashboards

  • Web-Portal (⭐229) - A python web app designed to allow a easy way to manage the links to all of your web services. AGPL-3.0 Docker/Python

Software / Proxy

  • Outline Server - A proxy server that runs a Shadowsocks instance for each access key and a REST API to manage the access keys. (Source Code (⭐6k)) Apache-2.0 Docker/Nodejs

items.title: Awesome Yew
items.content_text:
### Crates / Hooks

*   [Bounce (⭐101)](https://github.com/bounce-rs/bounce) - The uncomplicated state management library for Yew, inspired by [Redux (⭐61k)](https://github.com/reduxjs/redux) and [Recoil (⭐20k)](https://github.com/facebookexperimental/Recoil).
items.content_html:
Crates / Hooks

  • Bounce (⭐101) - The uncomplicated state management library for Yew, inspired by Redux (⭐61k) and Recoil (⭐20k).

items.title: Awesome Ciandcd
items.content_text:
### Monitoring

*   [Barklarm](https://www.barklarm.com/)  Open Source multiplatform alarm munitor and build status of servers that support of CCTray Specification and Github Actions.
*   [CCMenu](http://ccmenu.org/)  OSx build status monitor for servers tha support CCTray Specification.
items.content_html:
Monitoring

  • Barklarm Open Source multiplatform alarm munitor and build status of servers that support of CCTray Specification and Github Actions.
  • CCMenu OSx build status monitor for servers tha support CCTray Specification.

items.title: Awesome Deno
items.content_text:
### Modules / Cloud APIs

*   [aws-api](https://aws-api.deno.dev/) - From-scratch Typescript AWS API client built for Deno.
*   [googleapis](https://googleapis.deno.dev/) - Auto-generated Google API clients for Deno.
items.content_html:
Modules / Cloud APIs

  • aws-api - From-scratch Typescript AWS API client built for Deno.
  • googleapis - Auto-generated Google API clients for Deno.
